captions.text:
What
The ultimate king at the end

Instead of school
in the practice room

I danced and sang
all night

When you're playing
I cultivated my dream, not sleeping

I stay up all night everyday,
holding my pen

After the sun rises,
I close my eyes

The double standard
and all the opposition

Amid all that,
I broke the limit of myself

Meanwhile, some are luckily
picked up by an agency

And being forced to rap
as they can't sing

Such a waste
to call you a rapper

I'll show you
as much as I'm honed

All the people
who looked down on me are now..
Oh oh oh oh oh oh hey

Oh, if you've done enough like me
Throw that stone

We go hard
We have no fear

Oh, if you've done enough like me
Throw that stone

We go hard
We have no fear

What
The ultimate king at the end

Still a trainee
and a rapper man
Yeah I do know that's nuthin

I was worried once
but now no need to

You're still amateurs
I'm a major

Hope you'll be rotten
like that forever

Like Rap Monster says
Just like a monster
I devour any kind of beat

Deserve to have my name
Guys, come on here

Look at the preview
The change of small fry idol

Haha, the pride of hip-hop guys
said it's impossible

But take a look
There's a period in it

I'll show you
as much as I'm honed

All the people
who looked down on me are now..
Oh oh oh oh oh oh hey

Oh, if you've done enough like me
Throw that stone

We go hard
We have no fear
Click click bang bangWe juss sing it like

Oh, if you've done enough like me
Throw that stone

We go hard
We have no fear

What
The ultimate king at the end

comments.text:
My account's RaveCannon, by the way. Actually I have more than one account. 
But, this is my new account, which I often use, and this is my account that 
has fanfics. The others don't.
comments.author: Kris Deanne

comments.text:
Haha, yeah, I write, have been into creative writing and Journalism since I 
was in Grade school, and I write on Wattpad, actually. But sometimes, I 
write so much and I don't even publish the parts, because there are times 
when think that what I write isn't good enough yet. I chose writing and art 
to release some tension and stress, ever since I was young, so I thought 
why not give Wattpad a chance and write my stories there?! But then, I 
think about the public's view on what I write, and if they would like it, 
so my friends would have to force me to click the publish button every 
time. Hehe xD
comments.author: Kris Deanne

comments.text:
+Kris Deanne Yea sure stick with Sehun, Kookie has plenty of fangirls/boys 
so he won't miss out really, Hunnie needs you :)Yea you're right. We'll let 
Tao go with no regrets and welcome him back if and when. LOL I guess the 
Hyun family will be happy now. I promised V since he isn't my bias in BTS I 
would pick a parent and I did choose his dad when I discovered BAP. Now 
Mummy Baek can step into his full deputy role. You write? That's cool and 
I've considered it myself tbh but I don't really have the guts to do 
anything other than Austen/modern twists (unpublished). Good for you! Must 
look for your stuff and add it to my collection.. Asianfanfics, Wattpad or 
somewhere else?
comments.author: Multidimensional

comments.text:
Haha, okay, maybe I can't really abandon Sehunnie for Kookie, lol. He's 
just... I really can't... Haha, it was so hard for me to choose a bias, I'm 
not just going to abandon him. First it was Chanyeol, and then I see Sehun. 
And then I see Luhan, but I see Sehun's face again, and his dancing... That 
always happens when I think like I'm about to have a new bias... I just see 
him, lol. And about Tao, I think we should let him do what he wants, it's 
for his health anyway, and if he ever wants to come back, we should welcome 
him with open arms... Although I still am stuck on OT12, my fanfics say so, 
haha.
comments.author: Kris Deanne

comments.text:
haha yea Sebooty... .Don't really have a UB. Just a fav or two favs in 
their respective groups. EXO wise I finally chose my bias (TAO) around 2 
weeks ago but I found out then  that he may be leaving/has left :( Poor 
Panda needs out for his health which is understandable but why couldn't I 
have chosen him earlier? But yea it was between Tao, Sehun, Baek and D.O 
for ages.  Never mind eh?
